workspace_access_policy.name: workspace_access_policy
workspace_access_policy.using:
current_setting('app.workspace_id')::varchar = "workspace_id" AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 
        FROM "workspaces" w
        WHERE w."id" = "workspace_id" 
        AND w."organization_id" = current_setting('app.organization_id')::varchar
        LIMIT 1
      )

organization_access_policy.name: organization_access_policy
organization_access_policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 
        FROM "workspaces" w
        WHERE w."id" = "workspace_id" 
        AND w."organization_id" = current_setting('app.organization_id')::varchar
        LIMIT 1
      )
